sourcesContent:
import React, { useState, useEffect } from "react"; import "./stockDetail.css"; import { ModalBuying, ModalSelling } from "../../items"; import axios from "axios"; const StockDetail = ({match}) => { const [buyOpen, setBuyOpen] = useState(false); const [sellOpen, setSellOpen] = useState(false); const [stockDetail, setStockDetail] = useState({}); useEffect(() => { axios.get(`http://localhost:8080/stocks/${match.params.id}`) .then(response => { setStockDetail(response.data) }) .catch(error => { throw error }) }) return ( <>
{stockDetail.stockName} {stockDetail.symbol} {stockDetail.date}
{stockDetail.nowPrice}
{stockDetail.dod}
전일 {stockDetail.close}
시가 {stockDetail.open} 		고가 {stockDetail.high}
저가 {stockDetail.low} 		거래량 {stockDetail.volume}
거래대금 {stockDetail.transacAmount}
setBuyOpen(false)} /> setSellOpen(false)} /> ); }; export default StockDetail;
